mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(reviewno, usersno, storeno, score, contents,rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb) VALUES(review_seq.nextval, #{usersno}, #{storeno}, #{score}, #{contents}, sysdate, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb})
